meanings.definition: A highly contagious viral disease affecting cats, characterized by fever, vomiting, diarrhea, and a decrease in white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: The shelter had to quarantine the sick cats with panleukopenias to prevent the spread of the virus.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian quickly recognized the symptoms of panleukopenias in the infected feline.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten joked that it caught panleukopenias from eating too many treats.
meanings.sent4: The outbreak of panleukopenias in the cattery was like a storm, leaving devastation in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The image of the weakened cat suffering from panleukopenias stayed with the vet long after the treatment was over.

meanings.sent1: The vet diagnosed multiple cases of panleukopenias in the shelter.
meanings.sent2: The research paper discussed the prevalence of panleukopenias in different regions.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with laughter when the teacher accidentally said 'panleukopenias' instead of 'panleukopenia'.
meanings.sent4: The panleukopenias in the report mirrored the increasing cases seen in the clinic.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were stocked with supplies to combat panleukopenias in the cat population.
